definition.script:
build job: 'BIOFORMATS-push'
build job: 'BIOFORMATS-maven'
build job: 'BIOFORMATS-image'
build job: 'BIOFORMATS-test-repo', wait: false
// This triggers a pipeline-components chain build job: 'OMERO-gradle-plugins-push'
build job: 'OMERO-push'
build job: 'OMERO-build'
build job: 'OMERO-server'
build job: 'OMERO-web'
build job: 'nginx'
build job: 'OMERO-training', wait: false
build job: 'OMERO-test-integration', propagate: false
build job: 'OMERO-robot', wait: false
build job: 'OMERO-docs', wait: false
